critical_issues.issue: Video 1 P 6, 1st statement. The word "impact" at the end should be "impactful". Video 2 P2. The phrase "AI empowers leaders" appears multiple times across the modules. Once was sufficient. Shorten to "AI can identify..." Make similar ellisions throughout the document. In general there are a substantial lack of examples. Each video segment must include examples. What without how is poor teaching.
critical_issues.details: The module suffers from the lack of examples

critical_issues.issue: V1 P2 Alignment: change "AI companies" to "companies utilizing AI". (This module is much better than chap 1)
